name: Demasiado implicada
text: Dale esta carta al jugador que lleva a Greer Nelson. Puedes adoptar la identidad de tu Alter ego. Elige una opción: • agota a Greer Nelson → retira de la partida Demasiado implicada. • Cada Esbirro que esté enfrentado a ti se activa contra ti. Si no se activa ningún Esbirro de este modo, Demasiado implicada gana Oleada. Descarta esta carta.

name: El Encapuchado
text: Tesón. Infame. [star] Respuesta obligada: despúes de que El Encapuchado ataque, coloca 1 de Amenaza sobre el Plan secundario Bajos fondos. (Esbirro Archienemigo de Tigra.)

flavor: El Encapuchado has gathered the disparate elements of the criminal underworld together in one unified gang.
name: Bajos fondos
text: Ningún Esbirro [[Criminal]] puede sufrir Daño.

name: Capa del Encapuchado
text:
Vincula esta carta a El Encapuchado. De no ser posible, vincula esta carta al Villano. Respuesta de Héroe: despúes de que realices un ataque básico contra el enemigo vinculado, gasta recursos [energy] [physical] → descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: vincula esta carta a El Encapuchado. De no ser posible, vincula esta carta al Villano.

name: Madame Máscara
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: coloca 2 de Amenaza sobre el Plan secundario Bajos fondos. De no ser posible, localiza Bajos fondos y muéstralo.
[star] Aumento: coloca 2 de Amenaza sobre el Plan secundario Bajos fondos. De no ser posible, esta carta gana [boost][boost].

flavor: "¡Gata mala!"
name: Puzzle
text: Ataque veloz. [star] Respuesta obligada: despúes de que Puzzle ataque e inflija Daño a un personaje, coloca 2 de Amenaza sobre el Plan secundario Bajos fondos.

name: Un origen complicado
text: Dale esta carta al jugador que lleva a Teddy Altman. Puedes adoptar la identidad de tu Alter ego. Elige una opción: • agota a Teddy Altman → retira de la partida Un origen complicado. • Descarta todas las Mejora [[Cambio de forma]] que controles. Descarta esta carta.

name: Superskrull
text: [star] Interrupción obligada: cuando el Superskrull te ataca, descarta la primera carta de tu mazo. Si el recurso impreso de esa carta tiene: [energy] – El Superskrull recibe +2 ATQ para este ataque. [mental] – Descarta 1 carta de tu mano. [physical] – Dale al Superskrull una carta de Estado "Duro". [wild] – Descarta una Mejora que controles.

flavor: Superskrull was sent to abduct Hulkling after his true heritage was revealed.
name: Asunto de los Skrulls
text: Respuesta obligada: despúes de que se descarte cualquier cantidad de cartas de la parte superior del mazo de un jugador, coloca esas cartas boca abajo debajo de este Plan.

name: Poderes fantásticos
text: El Esbirro vinculado recibe +3 de Vida y gana Represalia 1. Cuando se muestre esta carta: localiza al Superskrull. Ponlo en juego enfrentado a ti y vincúlale Poderes fantásticos. Si tienes adoptada la identidad de Héroe, Superskrull te ataca.

name: ¡Te vienes conmigo!
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): descarta las 3 primeras cartas de tu mazo. Coloca 1 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal por cada icono de recurso distinto que haya en las cartas descartadas. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): descarta las 3 primeras cartas de tu mazo. Sufres 1 de Daño por cada icono de recurso distinto que haya en las cartas descartadas ([energy], [mental], [physical], o [wild]).

name: Iron Man
text: [star] Iron Man recibe +1 PLA por cada Accesorio [[Tecnología]] on him (hasta un máximo de +3 PLA). Setup: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for an Iron Man attachment y your team reveals it.

name: Iron Man
text: Tesón. [star] Iron Man recibe +1 PLA por cada Accesorio [[Tecnología]] on him (hasta un máximo de +3 PLA). Cuando se muestre esta carta: Inflige each player an encounter carta. Iron Man cannot take de Daño this phase.

name: Iron Man
text: [star] Iron Man recibe +1 PLA por cada Accesorio [[Tecnología]] on him (hasta un máximo de +3 PLA). Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for an Iron Man attachment y your team reveals it.

name: Iron Man
text: Tesón. [star] Iron Man recibe +1 PLA por cada Accesorio [[Tecnología]] on him (hasta un máximo de +3 PLA). Cuando se muestre esta carta: Inflige each player an encounter carta. Iron Man cannot take de Daño this phase.

name: Superhero Registration Act
text: Contents: Chosen leader I y II (III y IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, y 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme y your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, localiza the chosen leader's side scheme y muéstralo.

flavor: "Society will no longer tolerate superheroes who operate outside the law." —She-Hulk
name: Cut Off Support
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gana hinder 2[per_hero]. Interrupción obligada: cuando a player reveals a treachery, coloca 1 de Amenaza here. (Limit once per phase per player.)

flavor: Iron Man y his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. Ese includes former teammates such as Captain America y Spiderwoman.
name: Pro-Registration Tactics
Negative Zone Prison
text: [star] Reduce the target de Amenaza value of de este Plan by 1 por cada boca abajo carta debajo it. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que an ally is defeated by an enemy ataque, coloca that ally boca abajo debajo de este Plan. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Powered Gauntlets
text:
Vincula to Iron Man. [star] Iron Man's ataque gain ranged. Respuesta de Héroe: despúes de que realices un ataque básico against Iron Man, gasta [energy] [physical] recursos → descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: Reveal esta carta.

name: Rocket Boots
text:
Vincula to Iron Man. Iron Man gana the [[Aéreo]] trait. Respuesta de Héroe: despúes de que realices un ataque básico against Iron Man, gasta [energy] [physical] recursos → descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: Reveal esta carta.

name: Mark V Helmet
text: Vincula to Iron Man y dale a him una carta de Estado "Duro". Iron Man gana stalwart. Respuesta de Héroe: despúes de que realices un ataque básico against Iron Man, gasta [mental] [physical] recursos → descarta esta carta.

name: Arc Reactor
text: Vincula to Iron Man y dale a him una carta de Estado "Duro". Iron Man gana Represalia 1. Respuesta de Héroe: despúes de que realices un ataque básico against Iron Man, gasta [mental] [physical] recursos → descarta esta carta.

name: Mark V Armadura
text:
Vincula to Iron Man. Respuesta obligada: cuando Iron Man would take any amount of de Daño, coloca it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 de Daño here, descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: Reveal esta carta.

name: Repulsor Blast
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): Descarta una Mejora o support que controles. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): Descarta the top 4 cards of your deck. For each printed [energy] y [wild] resource discarded this way, inflige 1 de Daño to tu Héroe.

flavor: "Ese's it. Now I'm mad!" —Iron Man
name: Supersonic Punch
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): Iron Man ejecuta el Plan. If he has a Accesorio [[Tecnología]], you are confused. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): Iron Man te ataca. If he has a Accesorio [[Tecnología]], this ataque gana Penetrante.

flavor: Iron Man's vast wealth gives his Avengers a significant advantage over Captain America's outlaws.
name: Stark Tower
text: Cuando se derrote esta carta: The enemy team searches the encounter deck y descarta pile for an Iron Man attachment y your team reveals it.

name: Chaqueta Amarilla
text:
Dureza. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Give the enemy leader una carta de Estado "Duro".
[star] Aumento: Give the enemy leader una carta de Estado "Duro".

name: Wasp
text:
Teamwork ([[Vengador]]). Cuando se muestre esta carta: coloca 1 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal.
[star] Aumento: coloca 1 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal.

name: U.S. Agent
text:
Represalia 1. Dureza. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Inflige 1 de Daño a tu identity.
[star] Aumento: Inflige 1 de Daño a tu identity.

flavor: "Do us all a favor y stay down!" —Doc Samson
name: Mighty Avengers
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Resolve the "Cuando se muestre esta carta" ability of each Esbirro in play. If no "Cuando se muestre esta carta" abilities were resolved this way, esta carta gana Oleada.

flavor: "We've got you outnumbered y outgunned." —Iron Man
name: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each [[Vengador]] Esbirro gana the printed keywords of each other [[Vengador]] Esbirro.

name: Doc Samson
text:
Guardia. Cuando se muestre esta carta: You are confused. If you were already confused, coloca 2 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal.
[star] Aumento: You are confused.

name: Hellcat
text:
Ataque veloz. Cuando se muestre esta carta: You are stunned. If you were already stunned, take 2 indirect de Daño.
[star] Aumento: You are stunned.

name: Drafted
text: El Esbirro vinculado recibe +2 de Vida y gana the [[Vengador]] trait. Cuando se muestre esta carta: In competitive mode, the enemy team attaches Drafted to a Esbirro engaged with them y that Esbirro engages you. De no ser posible, descarta cards a the encounter deck until a Esbirro is discarded. Reveal that Esbirro y vincula Drafted to it.

flavor: "Do us all a favor y stay down!" —Doc Samson
name: Mighty Avengers
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Resolve the "Cuando se muestre esta carta" ability of each Esbirro in play. If no "Cuando se muestre esta carta" abilities were resolved this way, esta carta gana Oleada.

flavor: S.H.I.E.L.D. wants each state to have its own government-sponsored super team.
name: The Fifty State Initiative
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Cuando se derrote esta carta: Baraja el mazo each [[Vengador]] Esbirro in the encounter descarta pile into the encounter deck.

flavor: "It's S.H.I.E.L.D.'s mission to protect the world!"
name: Maria Hill
text: Represalia 2. Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team searches the encounter deck y descarta pile for a copy of Life Model Decoy y attaches it to Maria Hill.

name: Life Model Decoy
text: The enemy team attaches esta carta to a Esbirro o their leader. (Limit 1 per character.) Attached character gana stalwart. Interrupción obligada: cuando attached character would take any amount of de Daño a an ataque, evita that de Daño y descarta esta carta instead.

flavor: "Stand down, Captain. You are NOT in command here!" —Maria Hill
name: Executive Order
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: coloca 2 de Amenaza on each scheme. If Maria Hill is in play, esta carta gana Oleada.
[star] Aumento: If Maria Hill is in play, esta carta gana [boost][boost][boost].

flavor: S.H.I.E.L.D. exerts influence across the world by deploying its helicarriers.
name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Cuando se derrote esta carta: The player who defeated de este Plan deals 1 damager to each character they control y each Esbirro engaged with them.

flavor: "Just a bite! We won't kill them!"
name: Venom
text: [star] Venom's ataque gain Penetrante. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Venom ataque your leader. De no ser posible, Venom activates against you.

flavor: "This is too rich: I'm working for S.H.I.E.L.D. y Daredevil's the outlaw!"
name: Bullseye
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team discards un Accesorio a your leader. De no ser posible, descarta una Mejora que controles.

flavor: "We're all guilty. This is justice!" —Penance
name: Justice Like Lightning
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Cada Esbirro activates against the player it is engaged with. De no ser posible, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not dale a it a boost carta for this activation.

name: Excessive Force
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: coloca 1 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal por cada Esbirro in play. De no ser posible, esta carta gana Oleada.
[star] Aumento: The enemy leader ataque your leader (after this activation). Do not dale a it a boost carta for that ataque.

flavor: "They've all been fitted with explosive implants to ensure their compliance." —Maria Hill
name: Dangerous Recruits
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Interrupción obligada: cuando a Esbirro is defeated, dale a it to the enemy leader as a boca abajo boost carta.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Canalizar energía y attaches it to Captain Marvel. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que Captain Marvel ataque y defeats a character, coloca 1 energy counter on Canalizar energía.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Tesón. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Inflige each player an encounter carta. Captain Marvel cannot take de Daño this phase. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que Captain Marvel ataque y defeats a character, coloca 1 energy counter on Canalizar energía.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Canalizar energía y attaches it to Captain Marvel. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que Captain Marvel ataque y defeats a character, coloca 1 energy counter on Canalizar energía.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Tesón. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Inflige each player an encounter carta. Captain Marvel cannot take de Daño this phase. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que Captain Marvel ataque y defeats a character, coloca 1 energy counter on Canalizar energía.

name: Superhero Registration Act
text: Contents: Chosen leader I y II (III y IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, y 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme y your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, localiza the chosen leader's side scheme y muéstralo.

name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Recruits
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gana hinder 2[per_hero]. Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] minions y deals one to each player on your team as a boca abajo encounter carta.

flavor: Iron Man y his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. Ese includes former teammates such as Captain America y Spiderwoman.
name: Pro-Registration Tactics
Hunting Rebel Heroes
text: Cada hero gana the [[Unregistered]] trait. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que another carta is revealed that gives 1 o more heroes the [[Unregistered]] trait, inflige 2 de Daño to each of those heroes. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Canalizar energía
text: Permanent. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que a leader, hero, o ally ataque Captain Marvel, coloca 1 energy counter here. Then, if there are at least 4 contadores de Energía here, quita all of them → Captain Marvel ataque that character. Este ataque gana Brutalidad.

name: Captain Marvel's Helmet
text:
Vincula to Captain Marvel. Captain Marvel gana stalwart. Respuesta de Héroe: despúes de que realices un ataque básico against Captain Marvel, gasta 3 recursos of the same type → descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: Reveal esta carta.

name: Cosmic Flight
text:
Vincula to Captain Marvel. Interrupción obligada: cuando Captain Marvel would take more than 3 de Daño a an ataque, reduce that amount to 3. Then, descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: Reveal esta carta.

name: Photonic Blast
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): Descarta an ally o support que controles. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): Captain Marvel te ataca. coloca 1 energy counter on Canalizar energía.

name: Crisis Interdiction
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): Captain Marvel ejecuta el Plan. coloca 1 energy counter on Canalizar energía. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): coloca 2 de Amenaza on each scheme.

name: Energy Absorption
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: coloca 1 energy counter on Canalizar energía. Heal 1 de Daño a Captain Marvel por cada energy counter on Canalizar energía.
[star] Aumento: coloca 1 energy counter on Canalizar energía.

flavor: "Keep your sensors locked on North America. I want to know the location of Cap's headquarters." —Captain Marvel
name: Alpha Flight Station
text: Cuando se derrote esta carta: coloca 3 contadores de Energía on Canalizar energía.

flavor: S.H.I.E.L.D. formed an elite unit to confront y capture renegade superheroes.
name: Cape-Killer
text: Ataque veloz. [star] Interrupción obligada: cuando Cape-Killer ataque an identity with the [[Unregistered]] trait, it recibe +2 ATQ para este ataque.

name: Unregistered Super
text: tu identity gana the [[Unregistered]] trait. Acción de Alter ego: Descarta an identity-specific carta desde tu mano → descarta esta carta.

name: Bring Them In
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: agota each [[Unregistered]] identity. De no ser posible, the enemy team searches the encounter deck y descarta pile for a copy of Unregistered Super y deals it to you as a boca abajo encounter carta.

flavor: "Look what happens when you break the law!" —S.H.I.E.L.D. Officer
name: Arrest Order
text: Cuando se derrote esta carta: The defeating player deals the topmost [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] Esbirro in the encounter descarta pile to themself as a boca abajo encounter carta.

name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Soldier
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Put the topmost [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] Esbirro in the encounter descarta pile into play que esté enfrentado a ti.
[star] Aumento: Put this Esbirro into play que esté enfrentado a ti.

name: Rapid Respuesta
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Descarta cards a the encounter deck until a Esbirro is discarded. If you are in: • Alter-ego form, coloca de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal equal a ese Esbirro's PLA. • Héroe form, inflige de Daño to tu Héroe equal a ese Esbirro's ATQ.

flavor: "Stay alert. Cap's Avengers were last seen in this area." —S.H.I.E.L.D. Officer
name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Patrol
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each Esbirro gana Guardia.

flavor: "I don't like hunting down our friends, but it's better us than the Thunderbolts."
name: Colleen Wing
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Elige una opción an ally que controles (the enemy team chooses instead if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Descarta that ally.

flavor: "There is no shame in a righteous cause."
name: Shang-Chi
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Elige una opción una Mejora que controles (the enemy team chooses instead if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Descarta that upgrade.

name: Unregistered Super
text: tu identity gana the [[Unregistered]] trait. Acción de Alter ego: Descarta an identity-specific carta desde tu mano → descarta esta carta.

flavor: "I'm glad you guys went rogue; it's gonna be a big payday for me." —Paladin
name: Bounty Hunting
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Descarta 1 carta desde tu mano (at random if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). coloca 1 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal por cada resource icon on that carta.

name: Heroes for Hire
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Cuando se derrote esta carta: The enemy team searches the encounter deck y descarta pile for a copy of Unregistered Super y deals it to the defeating player as a boca abajo encounter carta.

flavor: "I'm not in this for your political agenda. I'm in it for the money."
name: Paladin
text: Ataque veloz. Dureza. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Descarta 1 carta desde tu mano (at random if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait).

name: Paladin's Pistol
text: Ataque to Paladin. De no ser posible, vincula esta carta a the enemy leader. [star] Interrupción obligada: cuando attached character ataque, this ataque gana ranged y Brutalidad. Descarta esta carta after this ataque.

flavor: "I'm glad you guys went rogue; it's gonna be a big payday for me." —Paladin
name: Bounty Hunting
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Descarta 1 carta desde tu mano (at random if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). coloca 1 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal por cada resource icon on that carta.

flavor: cuando Captain America took his resistance underground, Iron Man contracted Paladin y the Heroes for Hire to track him down.
name: Government Contractor
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each identity gana the [[Unregistered]] trait.

name: Superhero Registration Act
text: Contents: Chosen leader I y II (III y IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, y 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme y your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, localiza the chosen leader's side scheme y muéstralo.

flavor: With armed S.H.I.E.L.D. units patrolling the streets, crime rates have fallen to record lows.
name: Homeland Security
text:
If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gana hinder 2[per_hero].
Each Esbirro gana Guardia.

name: Superhero Registration Act
text: Contents: Chosen leader I y II (III y IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, y 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme y your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, localiza the chosen leader's side scheme y muéstralo.

flavor: "I can't believe Captain America has turned against his country!" —J. Jonah Jameson
name: Public Outrage
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gana hinder 2[per_hero]. [star] Respuesta obligada: despúes de que resolving step 1 of the villain phase, each player discards the top 3 cards of their deck.

flavor: Iron Man y his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. Ese includes former teammates such as Captain America y Spiderwoman.
name: Pro-Registration Tactics

flavor: "Wait until they see our plans to protect the midwest." —Yellowjacket
name: The Initiative
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team searches the encounter deck y descarta pile for 1[per_hero] side ejecuta el Plan y deals one to each player on your team as a boca abajo encounter carta. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: Iron Man y his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. Ese includes former teammates such as Captain America y Spiderwoman.
name: Pro-Registration Tactics

flavor: "There's no more amnesty for Cap y his renegades. It's gone too far!" —She-Hulk
name: No Going Back
text: Allies enter play exhausted. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: "I was a double agent for years. There's not much I won't do for a just cause." —Spiderwoman
name: Righteous Cause
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy leader ejecuta el Plan. If there is more than 1 player on your team, dale a the enemy leader an additional boost carta for this activation.

flavor: "I'm on target. Commence ataque." —Captain Marvel
name: Whatever It Takes
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): The enemy leader ataque your leader. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): The enemy leader te ataca.

name: Targeted Strike
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a carta y deals it to you as a boca abajo encounter carta.
[star] Aumento: The carta gana [boost] por cada player on your team.

name: Choosing Sides
text: Permanent. The enemy leader cannot take more than 2 de Daño a each ataque. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que the last de Amenaza is removed a here, the enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] encounter cards y deals one to each player as a boca abajo encounter carta. Flip esta carta.

name: Now It's Personal
text: Give to the first player. Acción: Quita esta carta a the game → each player on your team chooses 2 of your leader's set-aside player cards y adds them to their hand.

flavor: "Just because it's the law doesn't mean it's right."
name: Captain America
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Escudo del Capi y attaches it to Captain America. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que Escudo del Capi is attached to Captain America, dale a him una carta de Estado "Duro".

name: Captain America
text: Tesón. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Inflige each player an encounter carta. Captain America cannot take de Daño this phase. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que Escudo del Capi is attached to Captain America, dale a him una carta de Estado "Duro".

flavor: "Just because it's the law doesn't mean it's right."
name: Captain America
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Escudo del Capi y attaches it to Captain America. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que Escudo del Capi is attached to Captain America, dale a him una carta de Estado "Duro".

name: Captain America
text: Tesón. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Inflige each player an encounter carta. Captain America cannot take de Daño this phase. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que Escudo del Capi is attached to Captain America, dale a him una carta de Estado "Duro".

name: Superhero Resistance
text: Contents: Chosen leader I y II (III y IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, y 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme y your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, localiza the chosen leader's side scheme y muéstralo.

name: Gathering Support
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gana hinder 2[per_hero]. Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] minions y deals one to each player on your team as a boca abajo encounter carta.

flavor: Captain America y his Avengers are forced to go underground o face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. cuando Iron Man y Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.
name: Resistance Tactics

flavor: Captain America's Avengers continue to fight crime a their secret hideout.
name: Secret Avengers
text: The enemy leader recibe +1 ATQ while attacking (+2 ATQ instead if the ataque is undefended). If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Escudo del Capi
text: Permanent. Vincula to Captain America. Attached character gana Represalia 1 y ataque against them lose Penetrante. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que a hero o the Líder Capitán América uses their ATQ to ataque y de Daño attached character, vincula Escudo del Capi to the attacker.

name: Cap's Helmet
text:
Vincula to Captain America. Captain America gana stalwart. Respuesta de Héroe: despúes de que realices un ataque básico against Captain America, gasta 3 recursos of the same type → descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: Reveal esta carta.

name: Super-Soldier Serum
text:
Vincula to Captain America. [star] Interrupción obligada: cuando Captain America ataque, this ataque gana Brutalidad. At the end of this ataque, descarta esta carta.
[star] Aumento: Reveal esta carta.

flavor: "sufres your best shot!" —Capitán América
name: Shield Block
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: If Escudo del Capi is attached to Captain America, dale a him una carta de Estado "Duro" y a boca abajo boost carta. De no ser posible, vincula Escudo del Capi to him y dale a him a boca abajo boost carta.

name: Shield Toss
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): Captain America ejecuta el Plan. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): If Escudo del Capi is attached to Captain America, inflige 2 de Daño to each character que controles. De no ser posible, vincula Escudo del Capi to Captain America.

name: Heroic Strike
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): Descarta an ally o upgrade que controles. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): Captain America te ataca. If this ataque inflija Daño a un personaje, stun that character.

flavor: Captain America's stand against the Superhero Registration Act gives other heroes a figure to rally behind.
name: Fearless Determination
text: Cuando se derrote esta carta: Vincula Escudo del Capi to Captain America. He activates against the player who defeated de este Plan.

name: Falcon
text:
Teamwork ([[Vengador]]). Cuando se derrote esta carta: Give esta carta to the enemy leader as a boca abajo boost carta.
[star] Aumento: You are confused. If you were already confused, esta carta gana [boost][boost].

name: Hercules
text:
Teamwork ([[Vengador]]). Cuando se derrote esta carta: Give esta carta to the enemy leader as a boca abajo boost carta.
[star] Aumento: You are stunned. If you were already stunned, esta carta gana [boost][boost].

name: Goliath
text:
Teamwork ([[Vengador]]). Cuando se derrote esta carta: Give esta carta to the enemy leader as a boca abajo boost carta.
[star] Aumento: Give the enemy leader una carta de Estado "Duro". If they were already tough, esta carta gana [boost][boost].

name: Freedom Fighters
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Resolve the "Aumento" ability of each Esbirro in play. If no "Aumento" abilities were resolved this way, esta carta gana Oleada.
[star] Aumento: Resolve the "Aumento" ability of each Esbirro que esté enfrentado a ti.

flavor: "Tony's team is in for a big surprise!" —Capitán América
name: New Avengers
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Cuando se derrote esta carta: Baraja el mazo each Esbirro in the encounter descarta pile into the encounter deck.

name: Black Panther
text:
Teamwork ([[Vengador]]). Cuando se derrote esta carta: Give esta carta to the enemy leader as a boca abajo boost carta.
[star] Aumento: agota each upgrade que controles.

name: Spectrum
text:
Teamwork ([[Vengador]]). Cuando se derrote esta carta: Give esta carta to the enemy leader as a boca abajo boost carta.
[star] Aumento: agota a character que controles.

name: Freedom Fighters
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Resolve the "Aumento" ability of each Esbirro in play. If no "Aumento" abilities were resolved this way, esta carta gana Oleada.
[star] Aumento: Resolve the "Aumento" ability of each Esbirro que esté enfrentado a ti.

name: Switching Sides
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Descarta an ally que controles. In competitive mode, any player sobre enmy team may gasta recursos equal to that ally's cost to put it into play debajo their control. If no ally left play this way, esta carta gana Oleada.

name: Secret Avengers
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Cuando se derrote esta carta: The enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a carta. Give that carta to the enemy leader as a boca abajo boost carta.

flavor: "Once more, the surface-dwellers' war has injured my Atlanteans y the Sub-Mariner must avenge them."
name: Namor
text: Stalwart. Dureza. Infame. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Namor activates against you.

name: Neptune's Trident
text: Vincula to Namor. De no ser posible, vincula esta carta a the enemy leader. [star] Attached character's ataque gain Penetrante. Acción de Héroe: gasta [energy] [physical] recursos → descarta esta carta.

name: Horn of Proteus
text: Vincula to Namor. De no ser posible, vincula esta carta a the enemy leader. [star] Interrupción obligada: cuando attached character ejecuta el Plan, dale a it una carta de Estado "Duro". Acción de Héroe: gasta [mental] [physical] recursos → descarta esta carta.

name: Imperius Rex!
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: If Namor is in play, he activates against you. De no ser posible, the enemy leader activates against you.
[star] Aumento: Give the activating enemy an additional boost carta.

flavor: "There is nothing Namor will not dare o do to defend his people." —Namor
name: Ruler of Atlantis
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each [[Atlantis]] Esbirro cannot take de Daño.

flavor: "For Namor y the glory of Atlantis!"
name: Atlantean Guardia
text: Guardia. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Descarta the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Atlanteans
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Descarta the top 3 cards of your deck. If you are in: • Alter-ego form, coloca 1 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal por cada different carta type discarded this way. • Héroe form, take 1 indirect de Daño por cada different carta type discarded this way.

flavor: The Atlanteans as a people share a deep mistrust of surface-dwellers y enmity for the pollution of their waters.
name: Atlantis Attacks
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Descarta the top 1[per_hero] cards of your deck. coloca 1 acceleration token here por cada different carta type discarded this way.

name: Spiderwoman
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Sutileza y attaches it to Spiderwoman. [star] Interrupción obligada: cuando Spiderwoman ataque, she recibe +1 ATQ por cada skill counter on Sutileza para este ataque. Quita each skill counter a Sutileza.

name: Spiderwoman
text: Tesón. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Inflige each player an encounter carta. Spiderwoman cannot take de Daño this phase. [star] Interrupción obligada: cuando Spiderwoman ataque, she recibe +1 ATQ por cada skill counter on Sutileza para este ataque. Quita each skill counter a Sutileza.

name: Spiderwoman
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Sutileza y attaches it to Spiderwoman. [star] Interrupción obligada: cuando Spiderwoman ataque, she recibe +1 ATQ por cada skill counter on Sutileza para este ataque. Quita each skill counter a Sutileza.

name: Spiderwoman
text: Tesón. Cuando se muestre esta carta: Inflige each player an encounter carta. Spiderwoman cannot take de Daño this phase. [star] Interrupción obligada: cuando Spiderwoman ataque, she recibe +1 ATQ por cada skill counter on Sutileza para este ataque. Quita each skill counter a Sutileza.

name: Superhero Resistance
text: Contents: Chosen leader I y II (III y IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, y 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme y your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, localiza the chosen leader's side scheme y muéstralo.

flavor: "Why don't you chase after the REAL bad guys?" —Hulkling
name: Open Rebellion
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gana hinder 2[per_hero]. Interrupción obligada: cuando a player reveals a treachery, coloca 1 de Amenaza here. (Limit once per phase per player.)

flavor: Captain America y his Avengers are forced to go underground o face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. cuando Iron Man y Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.
name: Resistance Tactics

flavor: "Does anyone else see the irony in outlaw heroes fighting crime?" —Chief of Policía
name: Neighborhood Protectors
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team searches the encounter deck y descarta pile for 1[per_hero] side ejecuta el Plan y deals one to each player on your team as a boca abajo encounter carta. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Sutileza
text: Permanent. Max 3 contadores de Habilidad here. Interrupción obligada: cuando a treachery is revealed, coloca 1 skill counter here.

name: Contaminant Immunity
text:
Vincula to Spiderwoman. Interrupción obligada: cuando Spiderwoman would be stunned o confused, descarta esta carta instead. Give her una carta de Estado "Duro".
[star] Aumento: Reveal esta carta.

name: Pheromones
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: You are stunned y confused. coloca 1 skill counter on Sutileza.
[star] Aumento: You are stunned. De no ser posible, you are confused.

name: Venom Blast
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): This carta gana Oleada. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): Spiderwoman te ataca. If this ataque removed the following contadores de Habilidad a Sutileza: • At least 1, this ataque gana ranged. • At least 2, this ataque gana Penetrante. • At least 3, this ataque gana Brutalidad. You are stunned y confused. coloca 1 skill counter on Sutileza.
[star] Aumento: You are stunned. De no ser posible, you are confused.

name: Inconspicuous
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Chooose: • Descarta the highest-cost carta que controles • Spiderwoman ejecuta el Plan.
[star] Aumento: This carta gana [boost] por cada status carta on your identity.

flavor: "I've made a career out of staying one step ahead of S.H.I.E.L.D." —Spiderwoman
name: Self-propelled Glide
text: Interrupción obligada: cuando Spiderwoman would take de Daño a an ataque, reduce the amount of de Daño she takes by 1 por cada skill counter on Sutileza.

name: Spider-Man
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Spider-Man ataque each character with Tangled Up attached. If no ataque was made this way, the enemy team searches the encounter deck y descarta pile for a copy of Tangled Up y gives it to you as a boca abajo encounter carta.

name: Tangled Up
text:
Vincula a tu leader. De no ser posible, vincula esta carta a tu Héroe. Interrupción obligada: cuando attached character would scheme, intervención, o ataque, descarta esta carta instead.
[star] Aumento: If the Spider-Man Esbirro is in play, reveal esta carta.

flavor: "Friendly neighborhood Spider-Man swinging through!" —Spider-Man
name: Spectacular!
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: coloca 2 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal. In competitive mode, quita 2 de Amenaza a your leader's el Plan principal.

flavor: "This isn't about politics; it's about saving lives!" —Spider-Man
name: Neighborhood Héroe
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: In competitive mode, move 2 de Amenaza a your leader's el Plan principal to de este Plan. De no ser posible, coloca 2[per_hero] de Amenaza here.

flavor: "You S.H.I.E.L.D. boys better get out of my face."
name: Luke Cage
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Aturde your leader. De no ser posible, you are stunned.
[star] Aumento: Aturde your leader. De no ser posible, you are stunned.

flavor: "I thought I was done with all this superhero crap."
name: Jessica Jones
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Confuse your leader. De no ser posible, you are confused.
[star] Aumento: Confuse your leader. De no ser posible, you are confused.

flavor: "Since when is it illegal to save lives?" —Daredevil
name: Protect the Innocent
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Give the enemy leader y each Esbirro una carta de Estado "Duro". If the enemy leader was already tough, esta carta gana Oleada.

name: Street Defenders
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Cada Esbirro activates against the player it is engaged with. De no ser posible, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not dale a it a boost carta for this activation.

flavor: The Defenders were formed to protect people often overlooked by the Avengers.
name: The Defenders
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each Esbirro gana Guardia.

flavor: "My respect for the law doesn't blind my sense of right y wrong."
name: Daredevil
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team exhausts a character que controles.
[star] Aumento: agota a character que controles.

name: Iron Fist
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Iron Fist ataque your leader. De no ser posible, Iron Fist activates against you.
[star] Aumento: The enemy leader ataque your leader (after this activation). Do not dale a it a boost carta para este ataque.

name: Resistance Fighter
text:
Vincula to a Esbirro of the enemy team's choice. De no ser posible, esta carta gana Oleada. Attached Esbirro recibe +4 de Vida y gana stalwart.
[star] Aumento: Vincula esta carta to a Esbirro que esté enfrentado a ti.

name: Street Defenders
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Cada Esbirro activates against the player it is engaged with. De no ser posible, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not dale a it a boost carta for this activation.

flavor: "Tell S.H.I.E.L.D. to pull back. This city is debajo our protection." —Daredevil
name: Defend Hell's Kitchen
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Threat cannot be removed a de este Plan while a [[Defender]] Esbirro is in play.

name: Cloak
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: coloca 2 de Amenaza on a scheme. In competitive mode, quita 2 de Amenaza a your leader's el Plan principal.
[star] Aumento: If Dagger is in play, reveal Cloak. De no ser posible, coloca 1 de Amenaza on a scheme.

name: Dagger
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Heal 2 de Daño a the enemy leader. Inflige 2 de Daño to a character que controles.
[star] Aumento: If Cloak is in play, reveal Dagger. De no ser posible, inflige 1 de Daño to a character que controles.

name: Darkforce
text: Vincula to the enemy leader y dale a them una carta de Estado "Duro". [star] Respuesta obligada: despúes de que attached leader ejecuta el Plan y places de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal, quita an equal amount of de Amenaza a your leader's el Plan principal. Descarta esta carta.

flavor: "Maybe my daggers will help them see the light!" —Dagger
name: Lightforce
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Heal 3 de Daño a the enemy leader. sufres 3 indirect de Daño.

flavor: Cloak y Dagger were among the first to join Captain America's superhero resistance.
name: Cloak y Dagger
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Cuando se derrote esta carta: Heal 3 de Daño a the enemy leader y dale a them una carta de Estado "Duro".

name: Superhero Resistance
text: Contents: Chosen leader I y II (III y IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, y 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme y your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, localiza the chosen leader's side scheme y muéstralo.

flavor: Captain America's public denouncement of the Superhero Registration Act drew many allies to his side.
name: Rallying Call
text:
If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gana hinder 2[per_hero].
Each Esbirro gana Guardia.

name: Superhero Resistance
text: Contents: Chosen leader I y II (III y IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, y 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme y your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, localiza the chosen leader's side scheme y muéstralo.

flavor: "I forgot how exhausting it is to be undercover!" —Spiderwoman
name: Going Underground
text:
If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gana hinder 2[per_hero].
The enemy leader gana steady.

flavor: Captain America y his Avengers are forced to go underground o face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. cuando Iron Man y Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.
name: Resistance Tactics

flavor: The goal of the resistance is to wear S.H.I.E.L.D. down until the Superhero Registration law is overturned.
name: Guerilla Warfare
text: Respuesta obligada: despúes de que a status carta is placed sobre enemy leader, coloca 1 de Amenaza here. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: Captain America y his Avengers are forced to go underground o face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. cuando Iron Man y Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.
name: Resistance Tactics
Superhero Jailbreak
text: [star] Respuesta obligada: despúes de que resolving step 1 of the villain phase, each player discards the top carta of the encounter deck. Cada player who discards a Esbirro this way puts it into play engaged with them. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: "I was a double agent for years. There's not much I won't do for a just cause." —Spiderwoman
name: Righteous Cause
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy leader ejecuta el Plan. If there is more than 1 player on your team, dale a the enemy leader an additional boost carta for this activation.

flavor: "I'm on target. Commence ataque." —Captain Marvel
name: Whatever It Takes
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta (Alter ego): The enemy leader ataque your leader. Cuando se muestre esta carta (Héroe): The enemy leader te ataca.

name: Targeted Strike
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: The enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a carta y deals it to you as a boca abajo encounter carta.
[star] Aumento: The carta gana [boost] por cada player on your team.

name: Choosing Sides
text: Permanent. The enemy leader cannot take more than 2 de Daño a each ataque. Respuesta obligada: despúes de que the last de Amenaza is removed a here, the enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] encounter cards y deals one to each player as a boca abajo encounter carta. Flip esta carta.

name: Now It's Personal
text: Give to the first player. Acción: Quita esta carta a the game → each player on your team chooses 2 of your leader's set-aside player cards y adds them to their hand.
